text: Unn kay nabi ney unhen phir kaha kay uss ki badshaat ki zahiri nishani yeh hai kay tumharay pass woh sandooq aa jaye ga jiss mein tumharay rab ki taraf say dil jamaee aur aal-e-musa aur aal-e-haroon ka baqiya tarqa hai farishtay ussay utha ker layen gay. Yaqeenan yeh to tumharay liye khuli daleel hai agar tum eman laye ho
